II. Purpose of Addendum
Samaritas West CB410201266 is relocating from 207 East Fulton Grand Rapids, MI
49503-3210 to 2080 Union Avenue SE Grand Rapids, MI 49507.
III. Methodology
The on-site inspection of the new space was completed on November 10, 2020.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new office is located at 2080 Union Avenue SE Grand Rapids, MI 49507. This is
a two-story building that sits on the east side of Union Avenue SE and south of
Burton Street SE. On the main floor is the lobby entrance, staff café area, restrooms
(including family restrooms), several visitation rooms, several therapy rooms, work
stations, several conference rooms, administration area, staff lockers, copier room,
staff cubicles, private staff work areas, supervisor rooms, and a file room. On the
second floor is more staff workstations and cubicles along with offices for
administration and supervisors. The agency reports that this office space will allow
them to consolidate all of the services that they currently provide into one office
building (space). Overall, there is a significant amount of workspace and areas
designed for positive family interactions. The office which contains the confidential
information was observed and it was locked as was the file cabinet that continues
the CHRI information. There was a crosscut shredder for disposal of this confidential
information. There is significant parking available for families and the agency reports
that they will be developing outdoor space for family visits in the near future. This
space is more than appropriate for the workings and providing services for this
agency.
V. Recommendation
I recommend the new location be approved for the address change of this child
placing agency.
